title: Don't show 'blocked by' for closed blockers
description:
Tasks show 'blocked by: xxx' even when the blocking task has been closed.

## Current Behavior

Task list shows:
```
○ xvz - Integrate worktree
  blocked by: qos
```

Even when `qos` is already closed.

## Expected Behavior

Only show 'blocked by' for open blockers. If all blockers are closed, don't show the blocked indicator at all.

```
○ xvz - Integrate worktree
```

## Root Cause

The TUI probably gets blocked_by list from the tick data but doesn't check if those blockers are still open.

## Implementation

### Option 1: Filter in TUI

When rendering task list, filter blocked_by to only include open tasks:

```go
func (m *Model) getOpenBlockers(task TaskInfo) []string {
    var openBlockers []string
    for _, blockerID := range task.BlockedBy {
        if blocker, ok := m.tasksMap[blockerID]; ok && blocker.Status != "closed" {
            openBlockers = append(openBlockers, blockerID)
        }
    }
    return openBlockers
}
```

### Option 2: Fix in ticks client

The `tk` CLI or ticks client should not return closed tasks in blocked_by.

## Recommendation

Option 1 is simpler - TUI already has task status info, just filter.
acceptance_criteria:
1. Closed tasks not shown in 'blocked by' list
2. Task with all blockers closed shows no blocked indicator
3. Task with mix of open/closed blockers only shows open ones
4. Blocked icon (⊘) only shown when actually blocked
